Summary: I took a photo of a military helicopter and did not see anything unusal until I transfered them onto my computer.
trends: There have been 68 other sightings in Pensacola
There were no other sightings in Pensacola on or around February 27th 2013
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting Details I took a picture of a military helicopter that had been flying in the area at a high altitude. After transfering the pictures from my camera to my computer I noticed an object that appeared to be following the helicopter. It appears white in color and oval in shape. I did not notice the object while taking the picture. Another photo taken approximately 2 seconds later did not show the oval object.
